name: The Fat Tournament
description:
Every year, the Fat Tournament is held. People from around the world gather and tune in. 

You are a manager. Having managed teams in the past to no success. Maybe this will year will be different?

Instruct a team of 3 girls. You can guide them on  what they will do during the day. However, you need to keep them happy and well fed or they'll probably do their own thing.

Once the week has ended, the battles will begin. Will your team reign supreme?

Made for the Gain Jam 2021 - WeightGaming.com

Version 1.1 Fixes:

- Fixed issue where an incorrect sprite was being displayed

- Fixed issues where the 3rd fighter of two teams had no picture

- Changed the values of the Auto Battle, hopefully making it more balanced 

- Cleaned up some small inconsistencies
